cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BKITANN IC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.OABIBSI.SECRET. THE CO-ORDINATION OF LONDON TRAFFIC AGENCIES.3.P.236(27).MEMORANDUM BY THE MINISTER OF TRANSPORT.With reference to my Memorandum C.P.220/27 of the 8th August on London Traffic, I have heard both from the Rome Secretary and from the President of the Board of Trade that they agree that the Report should be sent confidentially to the Companies and Looal Authorities concerned, with a request for their observations, and suggest that in order to save time this might be done at once. The Prime Minister has agreed that if no member of the Cabinet wishes to object this oourse should be taken, and unless I receive objection by the 6th of October, the Report will be circulated accordingly.Clntd.) W.A.Mini stry of Transport. 29th September. 1927.
